description:
Welcome to the Horror House!: Chevy, Coron and Panky read a book about a mysterious Haunted House located somewhere in Candy Land as they all decided to go the said place. Coron herself wanted the diamonds that were in the abandoned house, but unknowing to them, the house is about to give them a bigger scare of their lives. Even worse, the Black Candies were also wanting the diamonds Coron is searching for. Later on, they finally discover the secrets inside the mansion with a little help.
The Apprentice Child Wizard!: The trio were playing knights and magicians one day until they encountered Saku, a Sakura flavored cat Zooble who is a apprentice magician. Saku herself is having a test to get into the Magic Academy, but she has problems on using her magic as the trio decided to help her. As they all successfully taught her to ride the broom, Saku decides to practice some magic with the trio, thought this backfires and worse, it transforms the trio into Frogs! And turning them back will be much harder than it looks.

titles.title: Welcome to the Horror House! / The Apprentice Child Wizard
Youkoso Horror House e! / Ano Ko wa Minarai Mahoutsukai
ようこそホラーハウスへ! / あの子は見習い魔法使い
